content:
Hi Eli

The app doesn't currently have an undo feature, however you avoid accidental deletions by enabling the confirm action dialog. This is found under general settings > interactions > confirm actions.

The community has suggested this feature on Mozilla Connect. You can show your support by up-voting the idea on the below link. https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/thunderbird-mobile-undo-function/idi-p/75074
creator: platform34

content:
Thanks for the suggestion. I think I had seen that, however when you are just scrolling through a bunch of spam or e-mails you don't even feel like opening, I want to go fast. Having to click on the "Confirm Action" each time might be annoying, but I'll try it.

Hopefully the developers can add this soon. Regards.
creator: Eli
